Title: I love the Yangzi River -- Indomitable spirit -- Enthusiastically celebrate the 35th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China
Designer: Feng Yinan (冯忆南)Yang Zhilin (杨志麟)Qian Dajing (钱大泾)
Publisher: Jiangsu meishu chubanshe (江苏美术出版社)
Notes: This is the third poster of a set of three, issued for the 35th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic in 1984.
Theme: 1 October, National Day of the People's Republic of ChinaSocialist Spiritual Civilization (1980-2000)
